channel.title: Point Shop Error
channel.description:
Hello, I have just come to find that one of my shops is not allowing the purchase of items with my server points. Here is a quick breakdown of what I see: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/45b5677f34362cef1393cc0523dc1463.png[/img] Above you can see that the shop shows the prices of the items and I have enough points, but it wont allow me to purchase them. Here is the code in ShopAssistant.java
if (c.myShopId == 17 || c.myShopId == 18) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId) + ": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Atonement points."); return; }
Here is the shop ID in Shops.cfg
shop = 17 Mage_Arena_Store
Please help :(

item.title: Point Shop Error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

eh add me on Skype.
